caption:
The photograph shows an outdoor scene where a man in a dark suit and hat is seated in the back of a parked truck filled with a large number of furs. The man appears to be handling or inspecting the furs stacked around him. The truck is positioned next to a building over which a sign reads "WEBLY FIRS." This indicates the scene likely takes place at or near a business dealing with furs.

The background features another building, trees, and what appears to be a residential street setting under a clear sky, suggesting the photograph was taken on a bright, sunny day. The composition of the image focuses on comparing the rural or small-town feel evoked by the surroundings with the commercial activity being highlighted.
title: Fur buyer with a load of deer hides in Leakey, near San Antonio
